New Records: Emmanuel Clase picked up his league-leading 45th save, a career high
Key Match Events: Brayan Rocchio blooped an RBI single into right field on the next pitch from Tampa’s Taj Bradley
Angel Martinez scored from third for a 2-0 Guardians lead
Jose Ramírez was tagged out, but Martinez scored from third for a 2-0 Guardians lead
Post-Match Reflections: Guardians manager Stephen Vogt said Rocchio is a smart baseball player, and he is developing into the type of hitter he will someday be
Vogt praised Smith’s work ethic and said it has allowed the rookie to turn in a dominant year as a reliever
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians reduced their magic number to clinch the American League Central Division to 9 over the Royals
Cleveland also moved closer to securing a playoff spot, with a magic number of 4 (effectively 3) over Detroit and Seattle
The game will air on Bally Sports Great Lakes, WTAM 1100 AM, WMMS 100.7 FM, WARF 1350 AM (Spanish) and the Guardians Radio Network
Others: The Guardians added a run in the fifth when Angel Martinez opened the inning with a single off Bradley and moved to third on another bloop hit, this time off the bat of José Ramírez
Lively scattered four hits and did not allow a run in five innings
